title: So my thermostat isn't working..
body: Remember a while ago I posted about how the heater at work wasn't working? Yeah, well now it's not working in my apartment. It's so fucking cold I had to sleep completely wrapped up in my blanket. My poor kitty is here cuddled up to me, too. I don't know what the problem is, but it looks like this thermostat is older than I am. Uggghhh what do I do..
